thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: No comments

author: news24.com
title: No comments
text:
It is better to suspend comments on your stories. You are a news supplier not soap box organisation or talk show.
The second you post a story the trolls and wanna be reporters all crawl out of the wood work and ALWAYS manage to turn the story regardless of what it is into a political, racial, religious circus.
Why have comments in the first place, you supply the story as you have it and report and update as the story develops.
Don't give Lee way for the key board Cluesou's and trolls to spew their inanity and hook others into online confrontations.
Disable comments and drag your waning credibility as a news supplier from the brink of collapse.
Just my personal 2 cents, oh heck, there I go making a comment! Hell, please help me and stop the commentary.
